channel.title: Add-on to tutorial
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I recently used this tutorial. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,55158.0.html
When you're in a safe zone, nothing appears on the bottom-right of your screen, but when in a pk zone, a skull and "Danger" appears on the bottom right.
Is there any way I can put something in my client.java, to make it say "Safe" when in a safe zone, but still say "Danger" when in a pk zone(or wildy area)?
Thanks! ;)

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

where would I put that?

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

public void WriteWildyLevel() { checkwildy2(); if(inwildy2 && !nonWild()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@cya@DANGER", 199); leftwild = 1; } else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1) { IsSnowing = 3; leftwild = 0; } outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@cya@SAFE", 199); leftwild = 0; }

Try that, I’m just guessing though lol

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Sick of Air:

Post the code and i’ll see if I can do it.

Link to the tut in my first post.

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:4, topic:83130”]You can, it’s just that nobody really wants to show you. :)[/quote]

Why wont they show me?

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

You can, it’s just that nobody really wants to show you. I would help, but I don’t know the code for the Wildy signs. I would suggest you just use the disappearing Skull in safe and the Skull in the Wild.

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @sgt_yoshi sgt yoshi
item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

[quote=“pmgz, post:2, topic:83130”]Well i wouldnt worry about putting safe because thats kinda weird to me, but to make people know there in a danger zone just look up the in client.java public void WriteWildyLevel() go down alittle and it will say sendQuest
just change what it says around. for my unreleased server I put sendQuest("@red@PK|@yel@DEATH", 199);[/quote]

I have that already. I just want to let people know when they are in a safe zone as well. Can i do both safe and danger ‘things’ at the same time? :P[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 07:00:54 PM[/size][hr]Im guessing you cant?

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

Well i wouldnt worry about putting safe because thats kinda weird to me, but to make people know there in a danger zone just look up the in client.java public void WriteWildyLevel() go down alittle and it will say sendQuest
just change what it says around. for my unreleased server I put sendQuest("@red@PK|@yel@DEATH", 199);

Read full topic

item.title: Add-on to tutorial

item.description:
@sgt_yoshi wrote:

Hey guys.

I recently used this tutorial. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,55158.0.html

When you’re in a safe zone, nothing appears on the bottom-right of your screen, but when in a pk zone, a skull and “Danger” appears on the bottom right.

Is there any way I can put something in my client.java, to make it say “Safe” when in a safe zone, but still say “Danger” when in a pk zone(or wildy area)?

Thanks!

Read full topic
